title: Ninja Tune XX - Sixx CDs (2010) [MP3-320]

PLUS box set owners will receive the following 12" singles for free (in the post):

ZEN160XX1

a. Roots Manuva 'Witness' (1 Hope) (Modeselektor Remix), Coldcut 'True Skool' (Zomby Remix), Stateless 'Ariel' (Rustie's Pentagram Remake)
b. DJ Food 'Dark Lady' (Alix Perez Remix), The Herbaliser 'Something Wicked' (Roots Manuva Dub)

ZEN160XX2

a. Pop Levi 'Blue Honey' (A Monstrous Psychedelic Bubble Mix by The Amorphous Androgynous)
b. Coldcut 'More Beats & Pieces' (United States Of Audio Remix), Flanger 'Psy Sound'
